data.text: Ne Yakobo, napakachi ba Nnoongo na Angwana ana Yesu Kilisto, nampatanga abali mangweto, mammi kabila komi na mabena, agapwilikine padunia joa!
Makalongo pannondoigwa mmanyanga kutenda ngi kingobu chinu chu kuala mwojo,
mmanyi kutenda kulondoigwa ku imani inu impe kuimbalila.
Nno! Kuimbalila kwinu kube mpaka pukupela, kupala nkomale na nnimbe panga pelelwa kilebe.
Nambu anda mundu kati jinu apelwi malango gu kumanya, apaligwa kunnyopa Nnoongo ojwabape bandu boa muno nu kwambone.
Nambu apaligwa kujopa ku imani pangapwele kilebe. Gambu mundu ojwabi na mbwele abi andi kilebe chikitoligwa na kimbonga nu kulekeligwa okwo na okwo.
Gambu mundu andi jwenio akahyobaleje kupoke kilebe ka Angwana.
Mundu juna ndela ibena kuchichilakana mundela yakwe yenie yoa.
Anda nnyinu mundu jwanhwamine Kilisto abi nhwocho apaligwa kuala mwojo pajinuligwa na Nnoongo,
na mundu juna uloi aalala mwojo pauluigwa na Nnoongo. Gambu mundu juna uloi apakujebelea andi liloba likamanyai.
Lichoba pilipita lumu kubala nu kulembuya matutwe, na maloba gakwe kutola pae nukualaje kabe. Uyo na mundu juna uloi apakujebelea mukubegele kwakwe.
Mbaya mundu ojwajendeke kuaminika mukulondoigwa, gambu andaimbalile mpaka kupela, aipata hupo ya bwomi eyalagila Nnoongo kapeganga abampala.
Anda mundu alondoligwe, akalengaje, “Nondoligwe na Nnoongo”, Gambu Nnoongo kunnondoyaje mundu kwa mabaja na jwenio.
Nambu mundu alondoligwa pautigwa nu kujonjigwa na tama jakwe mbaja.
Kuboka penia tama mbaja anda jikomile jileta mabaja na mabaja anda gakomile galeta kiu.
Makalongo bango manampala, makakoloigwaje!
Itoi yambone yoa ina kuala na tegatega iboka kumbengu, iboka Kawawa, abapangani muli kumbengu, benia kugalambukaje andi kiwili chikiama ama.
Kukupala kwabe bene ngubutupotola ku lilobe lyabe lya kweli, kupala tube milembu mu yoa yapangine.
Makalongo manampalanga nkombakelanga kilebe chenje! Kila mundu ajojakele kujoa nambu akajojokeje kulongela wala akajojoke kuchimwaje.
Gambu lilaka lya mundu kuotwaje kamu gambone gapala Nnoongo.
Yene magalekele kutali mabaja goa nu uchapu mpokelange kukunyenyepa lilobe lya Nnoongo elyapandite umyojo jinu, lyene liotwile kunkombolanga mangweto.
Mikikikoloyaje mmene makangweto kukupenakia tuje lilobe lyakwe nambu mpaligwa kamula ku itendwa.
Anda mundu jwajoa jwapenakia lilobe lyenie nambu kulibegeleje, jwenio andi mundu ojwakilolake mulindala,
andajomwi kikilolakea nu kuboka, kulibalila pabile.
Nambu mundu ojwakamu kukachana malagilo agalenganile nu kabeka bandu kube agabwa, nu kujendeke kutenda yenie pangalibalila chakijoine, nambu ngalikamula apakupata kindimba mu kila kilebe chakamula.
Mundu anda akibona nga ojwang'ola Nnoongo, nambu kulutabaje lugomo lwakwe mmanya jwenio ang'ongale Nnoongoje, na akikoloya mwene.
Ndela ejibi chwapi janga malemwa nnongi ja Nnoongo Awawa ngajenje, kajangata akakeba na akananhwele mumalola gabe, kikilende mmene makaakaigwaje padunia jenje.
